data.title: 5 Reasons Why More People Are Moving to Riverside South
data.meta_description: 5 Reasons why more people are moving to Riverside South, find out what makes Riverside South an irresistible destination.
data.text:
Looking for a new place to call home? Look no further than Riverside South! This thriving new community has become a hot spot for residents, and it’s easy to see why. With its beautiful parks, amenities, and perfectly manicured lawns, Riverside South has something most families desire.

Located South of Ottawa, Riverside South is a charming neighbourhood that has been gaining popularity among people who are looking for more space, a quiet environment, and affordable living. The area is surrounded by parks, walking trails, and river views, making it a perfect location for young families and anyone who loves the great outdoors.

Its initial development was in the early 1990s. Envisioned as a master-planned community, Riverside South was designed to provide residents with a harmonious blend of suburban living and natural beauty, all within close proximity to urban conveniences.

The land on which Riverside South sits was initially owned by several farming families who cultivated the fertile soil for generations. In 1996, the renowned urban planner Robert Campeau acquired the land and laid the groundwork for the community’s development. His vision for Riverside South was to create a self-sufficient neighbourhood with a wide variety of housing options, ample green spaces, and essential amenities, all while preserving the area’s natural charm and heritage.

Over the years, Riverside South has grown into a thriving community, attracting families, professionals, and retirees alike. The development has remained true to its original design, incorporating modern architecture and infrastructure while maintaining a strong connection to its natural surroundings. In recent years, Riverside South has continued to expand, with new residential developments, schools, shopping centres, and recreational facilities being added to accommodate the growing population. Today, Riverside South boasts an extensive network of parks, walking trails, and conservation areas, allowing residents to enjoy the beauty of the Rideau River and its surrounding landscapes.

Affordable Living:

The neighbourhood offers a diverse range of housing options, catering to various budgets and preferences. From single-family homes and townhouses to condominiums, Riverside South provides modern and comfortable living spaces at relatively accessible price points compared to other regions within the Greater Ottawa Area.

One of the key factors contributing to the affordability of Riverside South is its strategic location. While the community enjoys a serene, suburban setting surrounded by natural beauty, it also benefits from its location directly across the Rideau River from Barrhaven which provides convenient access to essential amenities, such as shopping, schools, healthcare facilities, and recreational venues. Moreover, Riverside South’s proximity to downtown Ottawa and other employment hubs allows residents to enjoy the advantages of urban living while maintaining a more budget-friendly lifestyle as it is located just South of the Ottawa Airport among other communities along Hunt Club Road.

Amazing Location:

Riverside South is located in a gorgeous setting with beautiful parks, walking trails, and Rideau River views. It is a perfect location for people who love outdoor activities, such as hiking, biking, jogging, and walking. The neighbourhood has several green spaces, including Claudette Cain Park, Ralph Hennessy Park, and Brian Coburn Park, which offer a variety of recreational activities for families. In addition, Riverside South is conveniently located near major roads and highways, making it accessible to downtown Ottawa.

Also, the prime location, nestled between the bustling communities of Barrhaven and Manotick, makes it an exceptional choice for those seeking convenience. Its proximity to these well-established neighbourhoods grants residents easy access to an extensive array of amenities, services, and employment opportunities. Riverside South residents can benefit from the diverse shopping, restaurants, healthcare facilities, and educational institutions found in Barrhaven and Manotick, while still enjoying the serene beauty and tight-knit community spirit of their own neighbourhood. Additionally, the convenient transportation links between these areas and Ottawa itself make commuting and exploring the Greater Ottawa Area a breeze.

Great Schools:

Riverside South has some of the newest schools in the city. The neighbourhood boasts several public and Catholic schools that provide high-quality education for children of all ages. Some of the top schools in Riverside South include St. Francis Xavier High School, Earl Armstrong Public School, and Steve Maclean Public School. The schools in Riverside South are well-equipped with modern facilities, excellent teachers, and a safe learning environment.

Some schools in Riverside South and nearby areas include:

St. Jerome Catholic School (Fraser Institute School Ranking: 7.6/10)

École élémentaire catholique Bernard-Grandmaître (Fraser Institute School Ranking: 7.8/10)

Steve MacLean Public School (Fraser Institute School Ranking: 7.6/10)

St. Francis Xavier High School (Fraser Institute School Ranking: 7.6/10)

*Due to the Covid-19 policy response, many provinces temporarily suspended their testing programs for two years. As a result, the historical results for those periods will not be available.

**The ratings provided are solely for informational purposes and should not be the sole factor in making your decision.

Strong Community:

Riverside South is a tight-knit and welcoming community. The neighbourhood hosts numerous events and activities throughout the year, including summer concerts, farmers’ markets, community barbecues, sports leagues, and cultural programs, providing ample opportunities for residents to connect, engage, and form lasting friendships. Riverside South also benefits from active community associations, which work diligently to address local concerns, promote community involvement, and advocate for the interests of residents. This collaborative spirit is further enhanced by the support of local businesses, schools, and organizations, all of which contribute to the overall well-being and prosperity of the community. The strong sense of unity and pride in Riverside South creates a truly special environment, making it an ideal place to call home.

High-Quality Housing:

Riverside South offers high-quality housing options that cater to a diverse population. Whether you are looking for a single-family home, townhouse, or low-rise condominium, Riverside South has it. The neighbourhood has a mix of modern and traditional-style homes, with many new developments offering a range of customization options. The majority of properties built in Riverside South are built by good reputable builders such as HN Homes, Richcraft Homes, and Urbandale Construction.

Riverside South is a thriving and rapidly expanding community, with projections estimating a population of 50,000 residents by the early 2030s. This significant growth presents a promising future for development in the area, as local authorities and developers work together to meet the evolving needs of the community. As the population increases, residents can expect further enhancements in services, amenities, educational institutions, and a diverse range of property types to accommodate various lifestyles. The continued expansion of Riverside South will focus on creating a sustainable, well-balanced community that caters to the needs of its residents while preserving the neighbourhood’s unique charm and appeal. By prioritizing thoughtful urban planning, infrastructure improvements, and collaboration with local stakeholders, Riverside South is poised to emerge as an even more vibrant, attractive, and sought-after community in the coming years.

If you are looking for a neighbourhood that has affordable living, excellent schools, a strong sense of community, and beautiful surroundings, Riverside South might be the perfect place for you. With all the amenities and recreational opportunities available in the neighbourhood, it is no surprise that more people are choosing to call Riverside South home.
